sentences.en: ...75.6 percent of the male population over sixteen.

sentences.cn: …有大批黑人群体的的各地区。

sentences.en: A substantial proportion of the population speak a French-based patois.
sentences.cn: 人口中有一大部分说以法语为基础的混合语。

sentences.en: About 4% of the prison population have chronic psychiatric illnesses.
sentences.cn: 大约4%的犯人有慢性精神疾病。

sentences.en: Almost 13 per cent of the working population is already unemployed.
sentences.cn: 就业人口中有将近13%已失业。

sentences.en: Bihar had a population roughly the same as that of England.
sentences.cn: 比哈尔邦的人口几乎和英国的一样。

sentences.en: Britain has the largest and most flourishing fox population in Europe.
sentences.cn: 英国拥有欧洲最大也是最具繁殖能力的狐狸种群。

sentences.en: Food production has already fallen behind the population growth.
sentences.cn: 粮食生产已经跟不上人口增长。

sentences.en: Forty per cent of the population is suffering from malnutrition.
sentences.cn: 人口中有40%的人营养不良。

sentences.en: Kenya's population is growing at 4.1 per cent per annum.
sentences.cn: 肯尼亚人口正以每年4.1%的速度增长。

sentences.en: Most of the world’s population doesn’t get enough to eat.
sentences.cn: 世界上大多数人都吃不饱。

sentences.en: Nearly 70 percent of the population still live in the countryside.
sentences.cn: 人口中差不多有70%仍住在乡村。

sentences.en: Rice is the staple food of more than half the world's population.
sentences.cn: 稻米是全世界一半以上人口的主食。

sentences.en: The human population swelled, at least temporarily, as migrants moved south.
sentences.cn: 随着移居者南移，人口出现膨胀，至少是暂时性膨胀。

sentences.en: The local economy is strong and the population is growing.
sentences.cn: 当地经济蓬勃发展，人口也在增长。

sentences.en: The population explodes to 40,000 during the tourist season.
sentences.cn: 旅游季节，人口激增至4万。

sentences.en: The spill could wipe out the Gulf's turtle population.
sentences.cn: 这次原油泄漏可能会使波斯湾的海龟灭绝。

sentences.en: There is a concern about replenish-ment of the population.
sentences.cn: 有人担心人口的补充问题。

sentences.en: Together they account for less than five per cent of the population.
sentences.cn: 他们总共占不到总人口的5%。

words.tran_cn: 居住于…中；构成…的人口（populate的过去分词）
居住于；构成人口；移民于；殖民于

phrases.tran_cn: 起始粒子数反转；原始群体
人口分布；总体分布；粒子数分布
群体遗传学；人口遗传学
人口规模；人口数量；群体大小
人口结构；种群结构；总体结构

trans.tran_en: the number of people living in a particular area, country etc
